name: Defines Universal Transforms
description: Establishes the formal mathematical definition of universal transforms that operate on prime coordinates to preserve information coherence across different dimensional spaces.
subject: urn:uor:resource:universal-transforms
contextualDescription: The Universal Transforms resource defines the formal mathematical structure of transformations that operate on prime coordinates rather than raw signal values, enabling dimension-invariant conversions between different representational domains while preserving essential information content and coherence.
